question:
Benny starts at number 2 on the number line. If he hops 5 steps forward, where does he end up?
[2 + 5 = ? ]

Benny starts at number 4 and hops 3 steps forward. What number does he land on?
[4 + 3 = ? ]

Benny starts at number 1 and hops 4 steps forward. What number does Benny reach?
[1 + 4 = ? ]

If Benny starts at number 7 and hops 2 steps to the right, which number does he land on?
[7 + 2 = ? ]

Starting from number 3, Benny hops 3 steps forward. What number does he land on during his exploration?
[3 + 3 = ? ]

Benny begins at number 6 and makes 4 hops to the right. Which number does he reach at the end of his hopping spree?
[6 + 4 = ? ]

Benny starts at number 10 on his magical number line. After hopping 2 steps forward, which number does he reach?
[10 + 2 = ? ]

Benny starts at number 12 and hops 5 steps forward. Which number does he land on?
[12 + 5 = ? ]

Just before reaching the final destination Benny starts at 34 on the number line. He jumps 5 steps forward. On which number will he reach?
[34 + 5 = ? ]

Benny starts at 31 on the number line. He jumps 6 steps forward. On which number will he reach?
[31 + 6 = ? ]
